channel.title: Admin/Mod spell set
channel.description:
Kinda stuck here since im actualy puttin an item to be needed in your inventory in order to use a 'pwnage spell' i want to know if theres another way to set a spell to be a mod/admin/owner spell if anyone knows can they post it please were i replace this code
[code]if((playerHasItemAmount(1048, 1)==false))[/code]

item.title: Admin/Mod spell set
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

hasumon:

Thats why i asked for a way to not havin an item in your inventory to use it. i want something that says like player rights equal or something similar like that.

Well, then use an if statement for playerRights.

Read full topic
